item.title: Presentation @ COMPTEXT 2022
item.author: Author
item.description: Factionalism and the Red Guards under Mao’s China: Ideal Point Estimation Using Text Data This article estimates student participants' ideal points during the Cultural Revolution through analyzing expressed political views in propaganda publication. In this paper, we design a new strain of text scaling method as we called Slogan-based Wordfish (Sworfish) that takes advantage of the facilitation of the TextRank algorithm to extract the most representative major noun phrases, and estimates Bayesian Generalized Wordfish with those extracted text variables.
